data.actual_result: The first message of the DM doesn't have a date separator.
data.expected_result: The first message of the DM should have a date separator.
data.short_description: First message of a DM doesn't have a date separator[Look at picture].
data.steps_to_repro: - Look for a DM that is 2+ days old - Scroll to the first message - See how it doesn't have a date separator while other messages do(Between "This is the beginning of your direct message..." and your first message.
